description._content: ID: 065094 Title: Begin. [fol. 2 recto:] wHan that Apprill with his Provenance: [William Caxton: Westminster, 1478?] Caption: Geoffrey Chaucer Notes: Geoffrey Chaucer (c.1345-1400). English poet. Coloured full figure portrait. Image taken from Begin. [fol. 2 recto:] wHan that Apprill with his shouris sote And the droughte of marche hath :cid y:e rote, etc. [fol. 373 recto:] Explicit Tractatus Galfrydi Chaucer de Penitencia vt dicitur pro fabula Rectoris. End. [fol. 373 verso:] nOw pray I to hem alle that herkene this litil tretyse Per omnia secula seculo: Amen. B.L. This image has been added to the Caxton edition and dates to the eighteenth century. Language: English Source identifier: 167.c.26, frontispiece British Library Shelfmark: 167.c.26 If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of this image, please place an order at Images Online imagesonline.bl.uk. The details from the above list should help you locate the images.
